band-text1: If you need a highlight for your restaurant or event, look no further. We are the
band-text2: . A diverse group of passionate musicians and entertainers from Berlin. Our roots are familiar yet mysterious. And so we bring sound and culture from Germany, Ukraine, and Poland.
